text: Martine Carol (16 May 1920 – 6 February 1967) was a French actress. She played the lead role in the 1955 romantic movie Lola Montès. She was also married to notable men such as actor Joseph Stephen Crane. Carol died of a heart attack on 6 February 1967 while filming a movie in Monte Carlo, Monaco at the age of 46. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:French movie actors Category:French stage actors Category:Actors from Paris Category:People from Val-de-Marne
title: Martine Carol
